resources.string: ............................ \n This mobile app serves as a simple guide for both local and international tourists who would like to know about Ghanaian Tourism and experience the various tourist destinations in the country.
Have fun observing animals in a controlled version of their natural habitats
Check out some natural and artificial water bodies in this region
Their beauty will leave you with the urge of coming back for more
Experience a grand tour within the different museums in this region
Take a tour around the historical forts built by the colonial masters
Have the freedom to relax and chill out on these awesome beaches
Take a tour around the historical castles built by the colonial masters
Be intrigued at the very sight of these natural water formations within this region
Have fun observing both wild and friendly animals in their natural habitats
Visit the many historical structures that this region has to offer
Visit these majestic landforms and maybe challenge yourself to the height
